review: I really like this, went from spending $200 on cable a month to this with sling tv, hulu, and Netflix for less than 35 a month and I'm not missing any of my favorite shows between the 3 and an antenna for local channels. So glad I found it! I do wish the remotes would work with all fire sticks because we have two (bought one and got one free for signing up with sling tv) and when I can't find one it would be nice to use the other but it's not too big of a deal. Overall I am very happy with it and I am saving a ton. Also we just went to the coast and brought it along so we could watch all of our shows at the hotel and it was great!
author: Crystal
